roleOverview: Data Scientists analyze complex data to generate insights, build predictive models, and support business decisions through statistics and machine learning.
requiredSkills: Machine learning model development and evaluation
beginnerStage: Learn Python for data analysis and SQL querying
Practice exploratory analysis on public datasets
Master core statistics and hypothesis testing
intermediateStage: Build supervised and unsupervised ML models
Develop dashboards and communicate business insights
Participate in domain projects like churn prediction or demand forecasting
advancedStage: Design robust ML pipelines and model governance
Lead experimentation strategy and causal inference work
Collaborate with engineering for production-grade model serving
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
realWorldProjects: Customer churn prediction and retention recommendations
Fraud detection model with feature engineering
Sales forecasting pipeline with seasonality modeling
salaryInsights: Data science salaries increase with model deployment experience, business context depth, and demonstrated ROI from analytical initiatives.
